galapagos.genetic.codification

Class BinaryCodification

  • java.lang.Object
    • galapagos.genetic.codification.BinaryCodification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CodificationMethod

    public class BinaryCodification
extends java.lang.Object
implements CodificationMethod
    Codification method for decimal numbers. Given a range and a accuracy level, generate a mapping to a range of binary numbers.
    Author:
    Diego Montesinos
